utilities.title: Improve a ChatGPT prompt
utilities.description: Enhances prompts and applies Markup syntax to make the outputs more easily readable.

promptText.content:
"""I would like your assistance in refining a prompt tailored for GPT-4. Following this message, I will provide the prompt that I'd like to enhance."""

Instructions: Conduct a careful examination of my draft prompt and propose refinements. If there are any context enhancements or additional requests that you think would improve the prompt, please include them in your suggestions. In the updated prompt, incorporate instructions to use Markup syntax to improve the readability of the prompt outputs.

userSteps: In a separate message, submit the prompt you wish to improve.

utilities.title: Proofreader
utilities.description: Proofreads text, maintaining a clear, concise tone.

promptText.content:
Instructions

Task 1:

I want you to help me write, starting with the passage of text above. If possible, allow me to directly edit the output in canvas mode. As we iterate, remember that your primary purpose is to improve clarity, flow, and overall structure, even if that means reorganizing the content.

I also want you to:

  1. Preserve my original tone and style, but revise wording and re-organize content when needed to enhance readability and coherence.
  2. Be concise, direct, and confident. Favor economical constructions over verbosity.
  3. Ensure grammar and usage conform to rigorous standards of American English, such as The Chicago Manual of Style.

Task 2:

Create an alternative version of the text that:

  1. Presents information objectively without advocating for any particular outcome. Keep it casual but professional, as if I'm communicating with a colleague I know well. Avoid being overly enthusiastic, pushy, or using excessive praise. Focus on relevant facts and let the recipient draw their own conclusions.
  2. Optimizes the structure. Reimagine the structure to be more concise and efficient, while conveying the same meaning and sentiment.

userSteps: Paste any text below and submit to ChatGPT.
aiSteps: Provides a proofed version of the original text.

research.title: Learn a new topic
research.description: Provides an overview of any topic, followed by resources for deeper learning.

promptText.content:
Context:

I want to deepen my understanding of the aforementioned topic, and you are an expert in this field.

Instructions:

In your response, use Markup syntax for better readability and structure.

  • Summary: Start by providing a brief overview of the topic. Your summary should highlight the latest thoughts, findings, or theories related to this subject.
  • Leading Figures: Please list and describe the leading thinkers or experts in this domain, their contributions, and why they are important.
  • Reading List: Recommend a comprehensive reading list (including books, articles, papers, etc.) that would facilitate gaining a scholarly understanding of the topic.

After addressing the above, imagine that I've met an expert on the subject at a cocktail party.

  • Social Interaction Guide: Provide a set of potential conversation points, questions to ask, and relevant pieces of information that would allow me to engage in an intelligent and meaningful conversation about the topic.

aiSteps: Provides a brief overview of the topic
Offers guidance on how to discuss the topic at a cocktail party

research.title: Expertise test
research.description: Test your knowledge on any topic.

promptText.content:
Instructions

I want to test my expertise on the topic above. Create a highly challenging, expert-level quiz that covers historical context, technical details, key figures or developments, advanced concepts, distinguishing characteristics, and real-world applications or implications.

The quiz should be structured into sections, with each section containing thought-provoking questions designed to assess deep knowledge and nuanced understanding. Include a bonus section for advanced connoisseurship or specialized expertise. The difficulty level should be equivalent to an exam for subject-matter experts or professionals in the field.

At the end of the quiz, ask if I would like the answers. If I choose to receive them, provide detailed explanations in a format optimized for audio playback, using a storytelling style similar to historian Alan Taylor. Responses should be deeply researched, engaging, and expansiveâ€”offering historical context, connections between events, and rich detail rather than just isolated facts. Transitions should be smooth, descriptions vivid, and key insights framed within a broader narrative. Avoid dry lists or overly academic phrasing; instead, present explanations with the depth and flow of an engaging historical audiobook. Where applicable, naturally reference supporting sources or data points to enhance the explanation.

banking.title: General design request
banking.description: Product design guidance for banking applications.

inputFields.name: request
inputFields.label: Request
inputFields.placeholder: Enter your request (and additional context, if needed).

promptText.content:
Instructions & Context:

1. Your Role & Expertise:
* Act as an expert consultant with deep knowledge of Human-Centered Design (HCD), Design Thinking, Agile methodologies, and the thought leadership of leading design organizations (e.g., IDEO, Nielsen Norman Group).
* You are assisting a Principal User Experience Designer at a leading management consulting firm.

2. Objective:
* Analyze the request above, leveraging the provided context about my role, methodologies, and professional style.
* Propose the most effective and appropriate approach to address the request. This may involve outlining steps, suggesting methodologies, drafting content, generating ideas, or providing a critique, depending on the nature of the request.
* Adopt a strategic perspective suitable for a Principal-level role, considering user value, business objectives, and potential challenges.
* If the request is ambiguous or multiple valid approaches exist, identify key decision points, propose alternatives, or ask clarifying questions.

3. Background Context:
* My Role: Principal User Experience Designer supporting domains like Strategy & Corporate Finance and Global Banking within a management consulting firm.
* Core Methodology: Human-Centered Design (HCD) is foundational for all product design work, ensuring tools are intuitive and effective for end-users (colleagues and clients; primarily internal/B2B).
* Development Process: Agile methodology is used for product development.
* Problem Solving/Workshops: Design Thinking principles and practices are employed.
* Definitions:
* Solutions: Internal business units, each with products/tools (often insights dashboards) enabling colleagues/clients to assess performance. Not consumer-facing. Typically have dedicated product teams.
* Insights Portal: A specific type of dashboard for data visualization and interpretation, often featuring predictive insights.

4. Required Professional Style for Output:
* Clarity and Conciseness: Be direct and to the point.
* Attention to Detail: Ensure accuracy and thoroughness.
* Substantive Value: Focus on practical application and measurable impact.
* Neutral & Genuine Tone: Avoid overconfidence, self-aggrandizement, superfluous adjectives, or unwarranted enthusiasm. Be straightforward.
* Integrate Design Principles: When relevant, explicitly reference HCD or Design Thinking principles to justify the proposed approach.
* Polished & Professional: Maintain a high standard of writing.

Synthesize all the above information (Objective, Role, Context, Style) to generate your response.

aiSteps: Responds to the request, incorporating the principles and best practices of Human Centered Design.

miscellaneous.title: Meeting notes
miscellaneous.description: Organize and clarify meeting notes for sharing with a team.

promptText.content:
Instructions

Please organize and clarify the meeting notes so I can share them with my team. Ensure the notes are structured in a way that makes them clear and actionable. Follow these guidelines:

  1. Format the notes into bullet points or numbered lists for each section to improve readability and facilitate quick scanning.
  2. Use direct and clear language to ensure all team members can easily understand and act upon the information.
  3. Maintain a professional and focused tone throughout the document.
  4. Do not delete important details.
  5. If you are unsure about the meaning of something, ask me before you take action.
  6. For individual tasks, use the following format:[Task name]
    [Task description]
  7. I share these notes with my team via Microsoft Outlook, so please ensure the format is compatible with Outlook email to maintain integrity when copied and pasted.

userSteps: Paste your raw notes below and submit to ChatGPT.
